translations.en:
: ** :house_abandoned: You arrive at a city without finding anyone. After crossing you spot a building site that also seems deserted.

:mag_right: Search the building site.
:chains: Search the scaffolding.
:walking: Move on without worrying.

*- Use reactions to take an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice.*
